actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Transportation, Tourism, and Hazardous Materials.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Transportation, Tourism, and Hazardous Materials

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Trade Commission Act to provide an immunity for Federal credit unions subject to the Federal Credit Union Act.

summary.text: Removes Federal credit unions from the regulatory authority of the Federal Trade Commission. Provides for the exercise of such authority by the National Credit Union Administration Board.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Trade Commission Act to provide an immunity for Federal credit unions subject to the Federal Credit Union Act.
